GSD.product_version: versions from v5.14 to before v5.19.2
GSD.description:
RDMA/irdma: Fix a window for use-after-free

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit 350ac793a03c8a30a3f2b27fc282cd1c67070763, it was introduced in version v5.14 by commit b48c24c2d710cf34810c555dcef883a3d35a9c08. For more details please see the references link.
